episodes.content: Asakusa is one of Tokyo's most popular tourist destinations. But due to the coronavirus pandemic, visits to Asakusa are down, and the neighborhood is feeling the pinch. At the same time, it's using the situation as a chance to get inventive. This time, we take a virtual tour of Asakusa from our studio to see how things are going.
episodes.description: Due to the coronavirus pandemic, visits to Asakusa are down. Now it's using the situation as a chance to get inventive. We take a virtual tour of Asakusa from our studio to see how things are going.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: A Virtual Tour of Asakusa
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: Masks: an essential tool in the fight against the coronavirus. Now Tokyoites are putting their own spin on masks, expressing their individuality with unique patterns and designs. Let's learn how masks are serving as both pandemic protectors and fashion items!
episodes.description: Tokyoites are putting their own spin on masks, expressing their individuality with unique patterns and designs. Let's learn how masks are serving as both pandemic protectors and fashion items!
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Masks on the Move
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: In Japan, the coronavirus pandemic has brought new attention to a Japanese creature or Yokai, called Amabie, who's said to protect against plagues. Thanks to social media, drawing images of Amabie has become a new trend. Let's find out more about this mysterious creature.
episodes.description: In Japan, the pandemic has brought new attention to a monster called Amabie. It's said to protect against plagues. Thanks to social media, drawing images of Amabie has become a new trend.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Amabie vs. the Pandemic
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: The coronavirus pandemic has changed how we eat. With fewer visits to restaurants and more meals at home, people in Tokyo have started to think about food in a whole new way. Today we discover some new ways that food is nourishing both our bodies and minds.
episodes.description: The coronavirus pandemic has changed how we eat. With fewer visits to restaurants and more meals at home, people in Tokyo have started to think about food and nourishment in a whole new way.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: The Power of Nourishment
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: The pandemic has revived interest in an old pastime: fishing! Many Tokyoites are discovering the fun of this relaxing, refreshing activity and enjoying the way it helps them get in touch with nature. Let's cast a line and learn more.
episodes.description: The pandemic has revived interest in an old pastime: fishing! Tokyoites are discovering the fun of this relaxing, refreshing activity and enjoying the way it helps them get in touch with nature.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Fishing for Relaxation
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: The hotel business has taken a huge hit during the pandemic. That includes reasonably priced hotels popular with tourists from abroad, which are virtually on hiatus. Today, we find out how Tokyo hotels are fighting for survival by embracing new ideas.
episodes.description: The hotel business has taken a huge hit during the coronavirus pandemic. Today, we find out how hotels in Tokyo are fighting for survival by embracing new ideas.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Hotels Fight for Survival
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020
